author: Tommy Brooksbank
title: Health care workers fear losing their jobs during coronavirus pandemic
description: Steep revenue drops have forced small and rural hospitals to lay off staff.
content:
As the battle against COVID-19 ramps up across the nation, health care professionals at small and rural hospitals are getting furloughed, reassigned and told their employment contracts are canceled.
Leanne Helmerich is one of 600 staff members furloughed at … [+4183 chars]
